title: Fake Return Scams: Secure Your Crypto Investments
description:
Phishing scam operating via Twitch live streams impersonating 'ThreadGuy' and pump.fun founder Alon. The stream broadcasts pre-recorded footage and uses an overlay directing viewers to a malicious website (cashback.padretrade.fun) to claim a fake 8 SOL reward. Connecting a wallet to this site triggers a malicious transaction that drains user funds. The scammer frequently creates new Twitch accounts (currently: threadguyofflclailive) to evade platform bans.
